#summary LPC313x DIP Development Board

Designed to interface electronics to PCs via the High Speed USB interface.

Design Files are available in [http://code.google.com/p/opendous/source/browse/trunk/Current_Designs/LPC313x-DIP-Board SVN].

* Status * : 2009-10-04 - board was prototyped and is now undergoing testing.  Would like to aim for a November release.
